rules.name: allStackable
rules.description: All items have 64 stack size.

rules.name: ancientBartering
rules.description: Gives Piglins a specified chance to drop ancient debris.
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 100

rules.name: bucketSponge
rules.description: Using a bucket renamed to "sponge" removes fluids in the area.

rules.name: carefulBreak
rules.description: Places the mined block in the player inventory when sneaking.

rules.name: commandBatch
rules.description: Enables /batch command to execute commands multiple times.

rules.name: commandComputation
rules.description: Enables /computation command to test redstone contraptions.

rules.name: commandEnderchest
rules.description: Enables /enderchest command to open the enderchest of a player.

rules.name: commandItem
rules.description: Enables /item command to get item data.

rules.name: commandLocation
rules.description: Enables /location command to know where is a player.

rules.name: commandSignal
rules.description: Enables /signal command to get a container with comparator value.

rules.name: commandTotal
rules.description: Enables /total command to know the total sum of a scoreboard.

rules.name: compatibleEnchantments
rules.description: Disable enchantment compatibility checks.

rules.name: creativeKill
rules.description: Insta-kill entities when you are in creative mode.

rules.name: disableAnvilXpLimit
rules.description: Disable anvil max xp cap.

rules.name: disableEnchantmentCap
rules.description: Disable enchantment max level cap.

rules.name: endGatewayCooldown
rules.description: Toggle for end gateway cooldown.

rules.name: endMainIslandStructureGen
rules.description: Toggle for the main end island structure generation, turns off portal, egg, obsidian pillars, gateways and crystals.

rules.name: filterBotsInScores
rules.description: Bots don't appear on scoreboards and do not count in the total.

rules.name: forceShulkerTeleport
rules.description: Force shulkers to teleport when stay in invalid positions.

rules.name: ftlTNT
rules.description: TNT optimized for large amounts in Cannons.

rules.name: hopperLoading
rules.description: Hopper entity processing chunk loading.

rules.name: infiniteTrades
rules.description: Makes merchant offers unlimited.

rules.name: itemFrameDelay
rules.description: Item frame reset delay.

rules.name: keepProjectilesTicked
rules.description: Toggle for projectiles are ticked the whole time.

rules.name: lavaSponge
rules.description: Sponges remove lava too.

rules.name: llamaDupeExploit
rules.description: Enables old donkey / llama dupe bug.

rules.name: logTNTMomentum
rules.description: Debug TNT momentum transfer to enderpearls in console.

rules.name: maxHeightmap
rules.description: Set the max value possible for heightmap. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

rules.name: mineStones
rules.description: Blocks of stone material can be broken faster with netherite pickaxe.

rules.name: noObsidianPlatform
rules.description: Toggle for end obsidian platform generation excluding players.

rules.name: oldFlintAndSteelBehavior
rules.description: Backports 1.12 flint and steel behavior. Flint and steel can be used for updating observers / buds.

rules.name: onlyUpdateWarn
rules.description: Only show the version of Johan Carpet Addon only when there is an update.

rules.name: oreUpdateSuppressor
rules.description: Emerald ore acts as an update suppressor.

rules.name: seaLevelFishes
rules.description: Fishes only can spawn between y:45 and y:63, both excluded.

rules.name: shulkerFireDrops
rules.description: ShulkerBoxes drop their contents when burned.

rules.name: shulkerInception
rules.description: Enable the possibility to store shulkerboxes inside shulkerboxes.

rules.name: shulkerInsert
rules.description: Items are stored directly inside shulkers in inventory when players collect them.

rules.name: totalScore
rules.description: The scoreboard total appears on the scoreboard.

rules.name: xpBarMending
rules.description: Sneak to repair items with your stored xp.

rules.name: zeroTickFarms
rules.description: Bring back zero tick plant farms.
